DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy Testogel® 50mg/5g gel administer daily ( QD , morning dosing ) compare placebo administer daily ( QD , morning dosing ) , 3 month , hypogonadal men testosterone deficiency confirm clinical feature biochemical test . For men hypogonadism , treatment aim restore testosterone level normal physiological range .
DOC.brief_title: Testogel® ( Testosterone Gel 50mg/5g ) Treatment Male Hypogonadism
DOC.criteria: Male age 1868 year diagnose testosterone deficiency clinical symptom A morning ( 8:0010:00 ) serum Total Testosterone concentration ≤ 300 ng/dL , confirm second measurement morning serum Total Testosterone concentration ≤ 300 ng/dL ( sample take 1 3 week apart ) Abnormal prostate evidence prostatic symptom , prostatic mass induration rectal examination , elevated level prostate specific antigen ( PSA ＞ 4ng/ml ) maximum urine flow rate le 12 ml/sec ( urine volume great 150ml ) ( and/or International Prostate Symptom Score IPSS score > 19 ) Hematocrit > 50 % Major psychiatric illness Unable understand protocol give inform consent Use paroxetine clomipramine Active alcoholism History drug abuse within past five year ; Use drug might interfere result study ( e.g. , antiandrogen , estrogens P 450 enzyme inducer , barbiturate ) ; BMI < 18 > 30 accord Chinese BMI reference ; Generalized skin disease may affect absorption T ( e.g. , psoriasis ) know skin intolerance alcohol ; Prolactin > 40 mcg/L ; Untreated severe obstructive sleep apnea ; . Uncontrolled poorly control heart failure
